attributes.action: Make the Welsh Language an official EU language
attributes.background: The EU doesn't recognise the Welsh language as an official language, even though Wales is part of the European Union, please sign this petition to put Wales 'officially' on the map

rejection.details:
This is a decision for the EU, not the UK Government or Parliament.

The European Parliament has a petitions process. You can find out more here:

http://www.europarl.europa.eu/atyourservice/en/20150201PVL00037/Petitions

Alternatively, you could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to press for this at EU level.
